page.title: 05CHILD'S DAY AT SCHOOL
page.content: My name is Hazel Whiteford and I live at Tercrosset Farm,West Hall,BRAMPTON. My mam brings me to school by car and as soon as I come in I get my work out.At nine o'clock we have assembly.When we come out we all have to sit down at our tables and we do mathematical tables.When we come back from break we do some English.We have our dinner which is made in a little room near our room .We have our dinner in our class room and nobody goes home because the children would not have time to go and come back for the afternoon. Before bell we all play games .In the afternoons we do such things as :music, art, games, history, science and geography.Then we go out to play.At 3.30pm we go home.
